revised_title: Structural Changes in Squid Synapses after Calcium Injection
tldr: The study examines the structural changes in squid synapses after injecting calcium ions into pre- and postsynaptic axons. The results suggest differences in calcium-buffering mechanisms in the two types of axons. The research provides insights into the pathways taken by calcium ions during synaptic activity and the effects of calcium on synapse structure.
